name: Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzung
description:
Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzung

This story happened around ten in the morning. Two horsemen came to our hero, whose name is Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzung and who lived alone, far from other people. So, it could never be good news in medieval times.

Made by the, rs11, BTZ originally for "Gaminator 13" game competition.
